title: Question 99:
description: How can I hedge my debt?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value: Dhedge has sponsored a pool as a gift to SNX community that tracks the synths distribution in debt. You can invest your minted susd to track debt [here](https://app.dhedge.org/pool/0x3a4851597f36f459b58e65c55c8f3a8710313fc7)
